ingredients.item: 2 pork loin chops, trimmed of excess fat

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the pork chops for 5 minutes. Add the stock and mustard and simmer for  5 minutes. Add the pears, cover and cook for  3 minutes until just tender and the pork is cooked throughout. Stir in the parsley.
Microwave the mashed potato according to pack instructions and serve with the pork and sauce.
